channel.title: When Replying
channel.description:
[b]Help[/b] When replying to topic's it is unnecessary to reply saying things such as:
Yeah, i need help with this to!
Just wait for somebody to reply to the topic. You are most likely doing this for post count. Post count means nothing, this is not like other forums. What counts here is Rep. [b]Reputation[/b] Also when posting it is inapproptiate to ask for Rep, most people will do this for the obvious reason (becoming a moderator). ~Kennetht04~

item.title: When Replying
item.dc:creator: @kennetht04 kennetht04
item.description:
@kennetht04 wrote:

Yeah, I know alot of people who can help out. I now basics of Java coding, I know how to make private servers, I don’t know where to learn advanced. So I made a topic.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Quotes your sig:

If you need help with anything to do with private servers contact me on msn "kennytwigg@hotmail.com"

And i do help in any way REP me

item.title: When Replying
item.dc:creator: @kennetht04 kennetht04
item.description:
@kennetht04 wrote:

Help

When replying to topic’s it is unnecessary to reply saying things such as:

Yeah, i need help with this to!

Just wait for somebody to reply to the topic. You are most likely doing this for post count. Post count means nothing, this is not like other forums. What counts here is Rep.

Reputation

Also when posting it is inapproptiate to ask for Rep, most people will do this for the obvious reason (becoming a moderator).

~Kennetht04~

Read full topic
